name: Gerry's Easy Irish Stew
author: cricrinapoli
summary: This is a super simple and delicious Irish stew recipe which is perfect on a Sunday...and it'll make your house smell delightful too!
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 ½ tablespoons dry brown gravy mix
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat vegetable oil in a stockpot over medium heat
Cook beef until browned on all sides, 2 to 4 minutes per side
Stir in onion, carrots, and celery
Mix water, gravy mix, and bouillon together in a small bowl; pour into stockpot
Stir in Worcestershire sauce, chili powder, and oregano
Cover stockpot, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 1 hour
Stir in potatoes, cover, and simmer until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork, about 30 minutes more
